firstTimeModal.title: Compare Smart, Shop Smart – How CalcPrice Helps You Save

about.subTitle: Learn more about this app and how it helps you compare prices effectively
about.title: About

item1.title: Smart and Simple Price Comparison
item1.description: No more guessing which package size is the best deal. CalcPrice automatically calculates the price per 100g, 100ml, or unit, so you can instantly see which product is the most cost-effective.

item2.title: Save Money on Every Purchase
item2.description: Confusing prices? With CalcPrice, you can easily compare different package sizes and choose the cheapest option—without falling for misleading packaging tricks.

item3.title: Works for All Types of Products
item3.description: Whether you're buying cornflakes, cheese, drinks, cleaning products, or shampoo, CalcPrice helps you compare anything sold by weight, volume, or unit.

item4.title: Fast and Easy to Use
item4.description: Forget manual calculators or complicated math. Just enter the product price and quantity, and get an instant result—so you can shop smarter without any extra effort.

item5.title: Smart Ranking System
item5.description: Not only will you see the price per 100g/ml/unit, but CalcPrice also ranks products so you can quickly spot the best deal. No more guessing—just smart shopping.

calculator.subTitle: Compare product prices by weight, volume, or quantity and find the best deal
calculator.title: CalcPrice
